summary: Better Console Aliases - Items, ingredients, building supplies
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Requires Better Console by [/size][b]CDCooley
[/b]
[size=2]This is a text file including aliases for all alchemy ingredients from all DLC's and some other useful commands.[/size]

The text file will need editing to add in your specific DLC code. Find the console.cfg in Skyrim > Data file. An editing program like notepad++ recommended 

[size=3][b]Included Lists
[/b]
[/size]CrimeGold
Miscellaneous
Ores and ingots
Leatherwork
Gems
SoulGems (full and empty)
All Alchemy ingredients including DLC


[size=3][b]About the Naming
[/b]
[/size]I did not use spaces for these
    'Goat Hide' is listed as 'GoatHide'
    'Sabre Cat Pelt' is listed as 'SabreCatPelt'
    Ect

Gold Coins are listed as Coin

Ingots are just named as what type
    Iron Ingots are just 'iron'. Gold ingots are just 'gold'. Ores are the type and ore afterwards. So 'IronOre'

Anything with an apostrophe s had it removed
    'Chicken's Egg' is listed as 'ChickenEgg'

Soul gems are what level they are.
    'Grand' will give you a grand empty soul gem. If you want it full 'GrandFull'

[size=3][b]Extras
[/b]
[/size]I've included setting your crime gold to 0 as well. This will take coin from your inventory. To set crime to 0 just type in the main town name; Falkreath, Windhelm, solitude, morthal, downstar, markarth, riften, whiterun, winterhold.

Also included Lockpicks, Mammoth Tusks, Horkertusks, pickaxe, torch, woodcutter's Axe.

[b][size=3]About DLC items[/size][/b]
I have added these, but depending on your load order, you need to edit the file. To check go to NMM find the tab that says 'plugins' and see what DLC is listed as what. For me it looks like this
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/68bd38b2ea208e79540aa9b1d61471be.png[/img]
author: godricrandom
